ygData.subject: Re: Bug warning! Angstlich's Appalling Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The change in popularity happened when charm was taken away from pc and npc shaman. Before that, Sol B as very deadly, even more so than Lower Guk. Before
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Dec 30/99, "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...> wrote:
> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> Um. On Solusek Ro, at least, Phoenix was one of the first guilds in Sol B.
> For a long time, it seemed, no one wanted to go in. Phoenix helped to make
> it "safer" by learning the zone, what dropped there, etc. And now its
> popular.
> So they went off and found other places to hunt (though I guess some still
> go
> there)
>
> At least at the beginning, however, Sol B did not seem to be nearly the
> popular
> dungeon it is now.

The change in popularity happened when charm was taken away from pc and
npc shaman. Before that, Sol B as very deadly, even more so than Lower
Guk. Before that, on our server, if you went there it was only a matter
of time before your tanks got charmed and a chunk of your party was
wiped out. Removing charm from them made the dungeon majorly easier than
it was before and once that happened it became popular fast.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
